full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB BKA' SDOD DANG BCAS PA MCHOD CING BSKANG BSHAGS BZLOG PA BYA BA'I CHO GA DNGOS SGRUB CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,(CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RTA MCHOG ROL PA GSANG SGRUB BKA' SDOD DANG BCAS PA MCHOD CING BSKANG BSHAGS BZLOG PA BYA BA'I CHO GA DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA, 'DI NI KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BTZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I BKA' SROL DRI MA MED PA LA NYER MKHO BA'I YI DAM BSRUNG MA'I MCHOD CHOG RNAMS KYI 'GROS DANG BSGO BSTUN TE, KU S'A LI ^DHARM'A BADZRA GYIS RANG GZHAN GYI LA PHAN PA'I BSAM PAS DGE BYED ZHES PA CHU PHO STAG GI RGYU BA'I GNAS MCHOG BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DAD BRTZON DANG LDAN PA BHIKshU SU MA TI AANANTAS BGYIS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
